DOC.brief_summary: The objective randomized , single-dose , two-way crossover evaluation compare relative bioequivalence test azithromycin formulation ( TEVA Pharmaceuticals USA ) equivalent oral dose commercially available azithromycin ( Zithromax® , Pfizer , Inc. ) test population 24 adult subject feed condition .
DOC.detailed_description: Criteria Evaluation : FDA Bioequivalence Criteria Statistical Methods : FDA bioequivalence statistical method
DOC.criteria: Sex : Nonsmoking Male Female ; similar proportion prefer . Age : At least 18 year . Weight : BMI le 30 . Qualifying subject must good health physical condition determine medical history , complete physical examination , laboratory test , obtain within four ( 4 ) week prior study start . The subject may history significant past illness expect affect investigation . The normal status subject confirm follow procedure : Laboratory Tests : hemoglobin , hematocrit , RBC , WBC , differential count , serum electrolyte ( Na , K , Cl ) , fast blood glucose , BUN , bilirubin , creatinine , AST , ALT , LD , alkaline phosphatase , urinalysis . HIV , Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , drug abuse test do screening purpose . urine drug abuse test repeat checkin . Female subject serum pregnancy test do screen urine pregnancy test prior study period checkin . Laboratory value great ± 20 % normal range qualify unless specifically accept ( comment ) Principal Investigator . Results HIV , Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , drug abuse must negative nonreactive subject qualify study . Electrocardiogram : A 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) obtain subject . The original tracing , plus interpretation , include case report form packet . Subjects must read sign Consent Form . Subjects comply inclusion criterion must exclude study . In addition , one condition list exclude subject study : History treatment alcoholism , substance abuse , drug abuse within past 24 month . History malignancy , stroke , diabetes , cardiac , renal liver disease , serious illness . History treatment asthma within past five ( 5 ) year . History treatment gastrointestinal disorder within past five ( 5 ) year . History hepatic function impairment . Females pregnant lactating . History hypersensitivity azithromycin , erythromycin , macrolide antibacterial agent . Conditions upon screen might contraindicate require caution use administration azithromycin , include : Sitting systolic blood pressure 90 mmHg , diastolic pressure 50 mmHg . Heart rate le 50 beat per minute 5minute rest seat position . Inability read and/or sign consent form . Treatment investigational drug four ( 4 ) week prior initial dose study . Subjects donate blood within four ( 4 ) week prior initial dose study . Subjects smoke use tobacco product currently use nicotine product ( patch , gum , etc . ) At least three ( 4 ) consecutive month abstinence require .
